description: Professional and academic contexts, formal communication, and career development

sentences.english: I would like to apply for the position of marketing manager.
sentences.explanation: 'Postuler pour' = to apply for. Professional application vocabulary.

sentences.english: The candidate who has the most experience will be selected.
sentences.explanation: 'Qui a le plus de' = who has the most. Selection criteria.

sentences.english: It's crucial that all reports be submitted on time.
sentences.explanation: 'Il est crucial que' + subjunctive. Work deadline importance.

sentences.english: Having graduated with honors, she easily found employment.
sentences.explanation: Participe présent composé. Academic achievement leading to employment.

sentences.english: The meeting has been postponed until further notice.
sentences.explanation: Passive voice for business postponement. 'Jusqu'à nouvel ordre' = until further notice.
